data.name: Water Girls - Adult 18+ Content
data.detailed_description:
This DLC provides a selection of adult content to you in the form of artwork from the game: Wallpapers for your PC.
In addition you will also gain some special adult only Dakimakuras in massive high print ready resolution.

Once installed a new folder will appear in the game directory called 'DLC - Adult Extras' where you can find the extra content.

data.short_description: This DLC provides a selection of adult content to you in the form of artwork from the game: Wallpapers for your PC. In addition you will also gain some special adult only Dakimakuras in massive high print ready resolution.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC pack adds additional images for players to enjoy in the base directory of the game folder on your computer. Which shows women naked and having consensual sexual interactions with each other.
